items.en: How Man City's low block came unstuck
items.text_for_match: How Man City's low block came unstuck Match of the Day's Shay Given analyses how Man City's resolute low block was undone by a sloppy counter attack and some bad positioning from Gigi Donnarumma, allowing Arsenal score a late equaliser in their 1-1 draw on Sunday. Match of the Day's Shay Given analyses how Man City's resolute low block was undone by a sloppy counter attack and some bad positioning from Gigi Donnarumma, allowing Arsenal score a late equaliser in their 1-1 draw on Sunday.

items.ja: Who has made Troy's Premier League team of the week?
items.en: Who has made Troy's Premier League team of the week?
items.text_for_match: Who has made Troy's Premier League team of the week? After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. items.ja: Wolves remain winless as Leeds come from behind to secure victory
items.en: Wolves remain winless as Leeds come from behind to secure victory
items.text_for_match: Wolves remain winless as Leeds come from behind to secure victory Wolves stay bottom of the Premier League and remain without a win from their first five matches after losing 3-1 at home to Leeds, despite taking an early lead at Molineux. Wolves stay bottom of the Premier League and remain without a win from their first five matches after losing 3-1 at home to Leeds, despite taking an early lead at Molineux.

items.ja: Man Utd get crucial win over Chelsea after early Sanchez red card
items.en: Man Utd get crucial win over Chelsea after early Sanchez red card
items.text_for_match: Man Utd get crucial win over Chelsea after early Sanchez red card Manchester United hung on for a crucial win against Chelsea in the Premier League, in a frantic match that saw two red cards and three goals, all in torrential rain at Old Trafford. Manchester United hung on for a crucial win against Chelsea in the Premier League, in a frantic match that saw two red cards and three goals, all in torrential rain at Old Trafford.

items.ja: Liverpool maintain perfect start after edging past rivals Everton
items.en: Liverpool maintain perfect start after edging past rivals Everton
items.text_for_match: Liverpool maintain perfect start after edging past rivals Everton  Goals from Ryan Gravenberch and Hugo Ekitike guided Liverpool to a 2-1 win against rivals Everton to maintain their perfect start in the Premier League with Arne Slot's side having now won their first five league matches this season. Goals from Ryan Gravenberch and Hugo Ekitike guided Liverpool to a 2-1 win against rivals Everton to maintain their perfect start in the Premier League with Arne Slot's side having now won their first five league matches this season.

items.ja: Potter under pressure as West Ham beaten at home by Crystal Palace
items.en: Potter under pressure as West Ham beaten at home by Crystal Palace
items.text_for_match: Potter under pressure as West Ham beaten at home by Crystal Palace  Pressure continues to mount on West Ham manager Graham Potter as he sees his side fall to a fourth Premier League defeat of the season, losing 2-1 at home to Crystal Palace. Pressure continues to mount on West Ham manager Graham Potter as he sees his side fall to a fourth Premier League defeat of the season, losing 2-1 at home to Crystal Palace.

items.ja: Postecoglou's wait for first Forest win goes on after draw at Burnley
items.en: Postecoglou's wait for first Forest win goes on after draw at Burnley
items.text_for_match: Postecoglou's wait for first Forest win goes on after draw at Burnley  Ange Postecoglou's wait for a first Nottingham Forest win goes on after his side were held to a 1-1 draw at Burnley in the Premier League. Ange Postecoglou's wait for a first Nottingham Forest win goes on after his side were held to a 1-1 draw at Burnley in the Premier League.
